item0.title: Renault and Nissan Make Peace in a Deal to Tighten Oversight
item0.description: The Japanese carmaker will have Renault’s backing to fix governance lapses, in a deal made before a key shareholder meeting.

item1.title: PSG tried to break soccer by signing Neymar and Mbappe. The only thing they broke was themselves
item1.description: The French giants made the two biggest signings in soccer history back in 2017 in a bid to dominate the sport and change it forever. It didn't work.

item2.title: EU may need more time for top job choice - Irish PM
item2.description: Irish leader Leo Varadkar says picking a new EU Commission chief may require another summit.
